itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 63 : followHIM Favorites
title: Doctrine & Covenants 63 : followHIM Favorites
description:
Four-minute clip of Hank and John's favorite part of this week's Come, Follow Me lesson.
Great to share with family and friends!

Please leave a review on the podcast.

Join us on social media:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
